examples.text: towards a relationship but then I realize they disrespect themselves too lol
As long as you don't disrespect me I can care less about a bitch
Disrespect my girl I give ya ass a facelift
am sick and struggling through exhaustion for this disrespect .
The disrespect is real tonight religion is not something you
Never disrespect a girl , to impress your homies
I can't quite grasp the concept of downright disrespect . Even if anger resides between people ...
perfect but he's MY father . NOBODY will disrespect him .

senses.synonym: 04922864-n (a manner that is generally disrespectful and contemptuous);06217172-n (a disrespectful mental attitude);06727915-n (an expression of lack of respect);00696407-v (have little or no respect for; hold in contempt);02463257-v (show a lack of respect for)

relations.target: behaviour=01223473-n (manner of acting or controlling yourself);01223743-n ((psychology) the aggregate of the responses or reactions or movements made by an organism in any situation);04904939-n ((behavioral attributes) the way a person behaves toward other people);14031827-n (the action or reaction of something (as a machine or substance) under specified circumstances; \""the behavior of small particles can be studied in experiments\""

courteous=00642864-a (characterized by courtesy and gracious good manners; \""if a man be gracious and courteous to strangers it shows he is a citizen of the world\""-Francis Bacon);00644482-a (exhibiting courtesy and politeness; \""a nice gesture\""

esteem=06216535-n (an attitude of admiration or esteem; \""she lost all respect for him\"");07515980-n (a feeling of delighted approval and liking);14461018-n (the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded); \""it is held in esteem\""; \""a man who has earned high regard\"");00691692-v (look on as or consider; \""she looked on this affair as a joke\""; \""He thinks of himself as a brilliant musician\""; \""He is reputed to be intelligent\"");00695834-v (regard highly; think much of; \""I respect his judgement\""; \""We prize his creativity\""

respect=01135185-n (behavior intended to please your parents; \""their children were never very strong on obedience\""; \""he went to law school out of respect for his father's wishes\"");01231366-n (a courteous expression (by word or deed) of esteem or regard; \""his deference to her wishes was very flattering\""; \""be sure to give my respects to the dean\"");04921016-n (courteous regard for people's feelings; \""in deference to your wishes\""; \""out of respect for his privacy\"");05828314-n ((usually preceded by `in') a detail or point; \""it differs in that respect\"");06216535-n (an attitude of admiration or esteem; \""she lost all respect for him\"");07560785-n (a feeling of friendship and esteem; \""she mistook his manly regard for love\""; \""he inspires respect\"");14461018-n (the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded); \""it is held in esteem\""; \""a man who has earned high regard\"");00695834-v (regard highly; think much of; \""I respect his judgement\""; \""We prize his creativity\"");02462665-v (show respect towards; \""honor your parents!\""

lack=14472871-n (the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable; \""there is a serious lack of insight into the problem\""; \""water is the critical deficiency in desert regions\""; \""for want of a nail the shoe was lost\"");02638434-v (be without; \""This soup lacks salt\""; \""There is something missing in my jewelry box!\""

senses.definition: A lack of respect, esteem or courteous behaviour
